subject: Soccer
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Abby Wambach scored twice in the first half and her substitute, Sydney Leroux, playing only her second game for the national team, tied a United States record with five goals in the second half.
snippet: Abby Wambach scored twice in the first half and her substitute, Sydney Leroux, playing only her second game for the national team, tied a United States record with five goals in the second half.
